snippet: Newt Gingrich and Gov. Rick Perry of Texas attacked Mitt Romney’s character, his business record and his past views on abortion.
abstract: Newt Gingrich and Gov Rick Perry of Texas attack Mitt Romney’s character, his business record and his past views on abortion as the Republican primary contest moves to South Carolina.

byline.original: By JIM RUTENBERG and JEFF ZELENY
byline.contributor: Richard A. Oppel Jr. contributed reporting from Lexington, S.C.

lead_paragraph: Newt Gingrich and Gov. Rick Perry of Texas attacked Mitt Romney’s character, his business record and his past views on abortion.

headline.seo: Candidates Go After Romney in South Carolina
headline.main: Republican Rivals Batter Romney in South Carolina
headline.print_headline: Republican Rivals Batter Romney in South Carolina
